title: rich1616
author: rich1616
content: Hi all . Cant connect metamask to ledger . I have updated ledger/m.mask wallet. i have tried to conect on chrome and firefox browser . any ideas pls ?

comments.author: jordansteph
comments.body: Try this. It may be of help:1.Update your Ledger device to run on the latest firmware version2. Update your Ledger device to run on the latest version of the Ethereum (ETH) app.3.Ensure that Ledger Live is closed when connecting to Metamask.4.Ensure that blind signing is enabled on the Ethereum app settings on your Ledger device.5.Ensure your Ethereum (ETH) app is opened on your Ledger device before starting the "Connect Hardware Wallet"6.Lastly,If the issue persists,set your Metamask account, restart your browser and try connecting your Ledger device to Metamask again.

But when I'm on Chrome and I click a link that is supposed to call up the metamask, nothing happens. The screen just stares at me. I have cleared metamask and Chrome cache. Still nothing. I'm at my wit's end
